faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Ghibli AI
faq.description: Learn about common questions and answers about our Ghibli-style AI generator

q1.question: What is Ghibli AI?
q1.answer: Ghibli AI is a specialized AI image generator that creates authentic Ghibli-style artwork from text descriptions. It captures the unique aesthetics of Miyazaki's films, transforming your ideas into magical Ghibli illustrations.

q2.question: How does Ghibli AI work?
q2.answer: Ghibli AI uses advanced deep learning models trained on Studio Ghibli's artistic style. When you enter a text description or upload an image, our AI analyzes it and generates a new image that matches both your content and the distinctive Ghibli aesthetic.

q3.question: How long does it take to generate an image?
q3.answer: Most images are generated within 5-15 seconds, depending on the complexity of your description and the server load. High-resolution outputs may take slightly longer to process.

q4.question: Can I use the generated images commercially?
q4.answer: Images created with the free version are for personal use only. For commercial usage rights, please check our premium plans which include commercial licensing options.

q5.question: Can I transform my photos with Ghibli AI?
q5.answer: Yes, Ghibli AI includes a photo transformation feature that applies Ghibli filters to your existing images, converting them into Miyazaki-style illustrations.

q6.question: Is Ghibli AI suitable for beginners?
q6.answer: Yes, Ghibli AI features an intuitive interface that makes it easy for beginners to create beautiful Ghibli-style artwork without any artistic experience or technical skills.

aboutPage.title: About Ghibli AI
aboutPage.description: Explore our story, mission, and creative philosophy

ourStory.title: Our Story
ourStory.content1: Ghibli AI was born out of a love for the works of Hayao Miyazaki and Studio Ghibli. We are a group of creators passionate about animation art and artificial intelligence, hoping to use the power of technology to allow more people to experience the joy of creating Ghibli-style artwork.
ourStory.content2: Our team consists of artists, engineers, and designers, all dedicated to building a platform that both respects original art and inspires innovation. Through advanced AI technology, we make it easy for everyone to create beautiful Ghibli-style artwork.

ourMission.title: Our Mission
ourMission.content: Our mission is to democratize and popularize Ghibli-style art creation through artificial intelligence technology, allowing everyone to experience the joy of creation while respecting the value of original art.
ourMission.believe: We believe that technology should serve creativity, not limit it. Through Ghibli AI, we hope to:
ourMission.point1: Make Ghibli-style art more accessible and appreciated by more people
ourMission.point2: Provide new inspiration and tools for artists
ourMission.point3: Promote exchange and sharing in the global creative community
ourMission.point4: Push the boundaries and possibilities of AI art creation

feature1.title: Advanced AI Models
feature1.description: Our AI models are trained on thousands of original Studio Ghibli works, accurately capturing the details, colors, and atmosphere of Ghibli style to provide users with the most authentic Ghibli style experience.

feature2.title: Diverse Style Options
feature2.description: We offer style choices from various Ghibli films, including 'Spirited Away', 'My Neighbor Totoro', 'Howl's Moving Castle', etc., allowing users to choose different artistic styles according to their preferences.

feature3.title: User-Friendly Interface
feature3.description: We've carefully designed a clean and intuitive user interface so that both technical experts and art enthusiasts can easily get started and enjoy the creative process.

feature4.title: Privacy & Security
feature4.description: We value user privacy and data security, using advanced encryption technology to protect users' uploaded images and created works, ensuring users can use our services with peace of mind.
